ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.server
Class ServerDocumentImpl

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument
      ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.server.ServerDocumentImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerDocument, Serializable, Document
public class ServerDocumentImpl
extends AbstractDocument
implements ServerDocument

Default implementation of the ServerDocument. Implements also the PortableDocument interface from the network layer. Uses the Swing Document classes to keep the structure of the document.

See Also:
Serialized Form
